thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 8 of 122
thread.title: C M HAYWARD
thread.title_full: DialAFlight reviewed by C M HAYWARD

author: C M HAYWARD
title: C M HAYWARD
text: There's always a human ready to answer the phone and sort out all travel needs in a very friendly and efficient manner - makes a pleasant change from 99% of any other companies I've had the displeasure to deal with! Also saves time, effort and exasperation booking your own flights direct and they get the best prices too.
